nodes.text: Huvi was a Human male who served in the Thaereian military during the time of the Clone Wars.

Huvi was part of a squad of Thaerian spies who operated on the planet Cularin. When the Thaereian military arranged for the assassination of the negotiator Gavid Lermyn, Huvi and his fellow Thaereians Goss, Jova, Kellam, Scutt and Waals were sent to detain the Heroes of Cularin until after the assassination had taken place. Posing as members of the Cularin Militia, the squad attempted to persuade the heroes to surrender to them.
